tool.name: jDebug Collections Receiver Zero
tool.description: Submit a collection of fasta reads to blastn and output the organism
tool.command: output_directory="\$(dirname ${summary_out_file})" && ## echo "output_directory=\$output_directory" && tmp_file_name_1="\$(basename ${fastq_collection.forward})".size && echo "tmp_file_name_1=\$tmp_file_name_1" && python $__tool_directory__/../python/src/jp/banjer/reproduce/metagenomics/pmid33033132/jdebug_collections_receiver_zero.py --in_file "${fastq_collection.forward}" --out_file "\$output_directory/\$tmp_file_name_1" && tmp_file_name_2="\$(basename ${fastq_collection.reverse})".size && python $__tool_directory__/../python/src/jp/banjer/reproduce/metagenomics/pmid33033132/jdebug_collections_receiver_zero.py --in_file "${fastq_collection.reverse}" --out_file "\$output_directory/\$tmp_file_name_2" && cat "\$output_directory/\$tmp_file_name_1" > "${summary_out_file}" && cat "\$output_directory/\$tmp_file_name_2" >> "${summary_out_file}"

param.name: fasta_collection
param.label: Select a paired collection
param.help: A dataset collection of paired fastq files.
